extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2024-36401 or CVE-2024-36404 by retrieving the installed package versions.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2024-36401 or CVE-2024-36404?
Is updating to the latest version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the vendor's instructions to update to the latest versions of the affected packages to mitigate the vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove gt-complex-x.y.jar File
extracted_playbook.description: Remove the 'gt-complex-x.y.jar' file from GeoServer to eliminate the vulnerable code. Note that this may impact other functionalities.
